fireroom: The room is on fire, you take 5 damage!
healroom: A warm light envlopes you, and you feel your wounds closing up!
poisonroom: Poison gas filled the air, you choke and take 2 damage!
potionroom: You found a treasure chest, you open it to find a few potions!
atkuproom: You find a statue of Ares. You pray, and feel your muscles fill with power!
defuproom: You find a statue of Athena. You pray, and feel your skin hardening like steel!
hpuproom: You find a statue of Demeter. You pray, and feel boundless energy swell inside you!
